title: Late game FPS drop
body: So since the recent patch I have been have normal FPS in early game but then into late games i keep dropping frames even though i have no change in my ping..... Has anyone else experienced this? my computer is great for games but this wasnt happening prepatch

replies.body:
Hey guys, we're aware of this issue and trying to track down the cause now. You can help us do this by collecting some information and [submitting it in a support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

To gather the info:
1) Download the HRT [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)
2) Install and run
3) Untick "Add Firewall Exceptions" on the right and click start
4) Grab the logs from the folder on your desktop and attach them to your ticket

I am also experiencing this, getting down to even 50 frames which is absolutely unacceptable.

I have a GTX 1080ti graphics card, there is something very very wrong with the optimization of this game at the moment.
Yeah i also have this, it's ridiculous, and might be to do with all the added particle effects.
